snippet: Tensions are growing from the influx of Syrians and other migrants seeking entry to the European Union, even as some Muslims in the bloc flee in the opposite direction, to Syria itself.
lead_paragraph: Tensions are growing from the influx of Syrians and other migrants seeking entry to the European Union, even as some Muslims in the bloc flee in the opposite direction, to Syria itself.

headline.main: Freedom of Movement Tests Continental Unity
